scripts.db:push: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm -C backend exec prisma db push
scripts.db:generate: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm -C backend exec prisma generate
scripts.dev: pnpm db:up && concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan" "pnpm dev:backend" "wait-on -t 30000 tcp:127.0.0.1:4000 && pnpm dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:full: pnpm db:up && pnpm db:push && concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "BACKEND" --prefix-colors "yellow" "pnpm dev:backend" "wait-on -t 60000 tcp:127.0.0.1:4000 && pnpm codegen && pnpm dev:frontend"
